mapper.insert: insert into board_tb(board_id, writer_id, writer_name, title, content, task_id) values(board_seq.nextval, #{writerId}, #{writerName}, #{title}, #{content}, #{taskId})
mapper.select: select board_id, writer_id, writer_name, title, content, board_date, task_id from board_tb where task_id = #{taskId} order by board_id
